remark.html:
AWS add user via CLI

Примеры добавления пользователей в Amazon S3

Read only AWS S3 user

aws iam create-user --user-name RomanY
aws iam attach-user-policy --user-name RomanY --policy-arn arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/AmazonS3ReadOnlyAccess
aws iam create-login-profile --user-name RomanY --password RomanY2021 --password-reset-required

Более старый и развернутый пример

aws iam create-user --user-name MaksimSu

aws iam attach-user-policy --user-name MaksimSu --policy-arn arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/AWSLambdaFullAccess
aws iam attach-user-policy --user-name MaksimSu --policy-arn arn:aws:iam::763258690952:policy/ElasticSearchFullAccess
aws iam attach-user-policy --user-name MaksimSu --policy-arn arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/CloudWatchFullAccess
aws iam attach-user-policy --user-name MaksimSu --policy-arn arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/AmazonS3ReadOnlyAccess

aws iam create-login-profile --user-name MaksimSu --password MaksimSu2018 --password-reset-required

# create AWS\_ACCESS\_KEY and AWS\_SECRET\_KEY
# aws iam create-access-key --user-name MaksimSu
